titlestmt.subtitle: Inventory of Records
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Connecticut State Library staff.

publicationstmt.p: Copyright Â© 2012 by the Connecticut State Library

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Paul E. Baran on July 31, 2008

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: The Department of Transportation was created in 1969 per P.A. 768, sec. 3, with the merger for four agencies: State Highway Department, Department of Aeronautics, Connecticut Transportation Authority, and the Commissioners of Steamship Terminals.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Department of Transportation was created in 1969 per P.A. 768, sec. 3, with the merger for four agencies: State Highway Department, Department of Aeronautics, Connecticut Transportation Authority, and the Commissioners of Steamship Terminals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Included here are Tolls and concessions, log books 1942-1988; records of the Commissioner, 1941-2003, bulk 1973-2003; photographs, 1988-1989; Bureau of Aeronautics, Bradley International Airport, Automatically Controlled Transportation, 1974-1975; Mianus River Bridge Collapse investigation, 1983; Legislative proposals, 1994; and Films, 1973-1996. The bulk of the films are road logs.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series numbers used here are those previously assigned within RG 089 in its entirety and therefore the series described here are not numbered consecutively.
Series 22. Tolls and Concessions, 1942-1988, 51 cubic feet

Series 25. Commissioner, 1941-2003, bulk 1973-2003.
Accession 1994-022, 1986-1990, 27 cubic feet
Accession 2002-093, 1991-1994, 22 cubic feet
Accession 2004-021, 1994-1998, 17 cubic feet
Accession 2007-038, 1998-2004, 18 cubic feet
Accession 2007-041, 1941-2003, bulk 1978-2003, 4 cubic feet
Series 34. Bureau of Aeronautics. Bradley International Airport. Automatically Controlled Transportation (ACT), 1974-1975, Accession: 1997-013, 2.75 cubic feet
Series 35. Mianus River Bridge Collapse Investigation, 1983, Accession: 2001-006, .5 cubic feet

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p:
RG 089:001, State Highway Department, 1894-1975
RG 089:010, State Boundary Line Perambulations, 1965-1997
RG 089:011, Aerial photographs, see the Research Guide to Aerial Photographs at the Connecticut State Library
RG 089:024, Connecticut Transportation Authority, 1956-1973
RG 089:030, State Traffic Commission, 1935-1995
RG 089:031, Connecticut Public Transportation Commission, 1980-2001
RG 089:032, Transportation Accountability Board, 1986-1987
RG 089:037, Commissioners of Steamship Terminals, 1915

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Some of these records are stored at an off-site facility and therefore may not be available on a same-day basis.

note.p: Logs for 1945-1958 are labeled as C.O.B., 1958-1962 are labeled as Greater Hartford Bridge Authority, and 1962-1978 are labeled as Hartford Area Toll Bridges.

scopecontent.p: Commissioners J.W. Burns and Emil H. Frankel.

accessrestrict.p: To view digitized copies of these films, contact Bradley J. Overturf, Transportation Photolog Supervisor, Bureau of Policy and Planning, Connecticut Dept. of Transportation, at 860-594-2160 (Newington) or 860-258-0319 (Rocky Hill).
